name: Deathfire: Ruins of Nethermore RPG
blurb: A single-player party-based CRPG that combines deep characters and rich storytelling with turn-based combat\u2014NOT A DUNGEON CRAWLER!

rewards.reward: No Reward

THANK YOU EDITION—This reward is for those who simply want to show their support for the project. Get your NAME IN THE GAME’S CREDITS, as well as exclusive access to our BACKER FORUMS.
=============================
               NOTES FOR REWARDS
=============================

Over the course of the campaign many new rewards have been included in virtually all tiers, adding tremendous value to each of them. As a result, the reward information in the tier selections below is no longer accurate or complete. Please consult the charts and images at the bottom of this page for accurate and up-to-date information.

=============================
GAME AVAILABILITY
=============================
We also want to point out that the game will be DRM-free and available on Windows, MAC OSX and Linux. A Steam key will be made available to those backers who would like to obtain their digital copy through the Steam Network.
THANK YOU EDITION\u2014This reward is for those who simply want to show their support for the project. Get your NAME IN THE GAME\u2019S CREDITS, as well as exclusive access to our BACKER FORUMS.

POINT OF ENTRY EDITION\u2014This is our most basic edition to include a DIGITAL COPY of the game. Along with it you also the access to the BACKER FORUMS and the BETA ACCESS, and you will get YOUR NAME IN THE GAME'S CREDITS. \r\nNone of the other bonus items or value added content will be included in this tier!

EARLY BIRD EDITION\u2014This reward is available only to the first \u201cDeathfire\u201d backers. You will received a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD copy of the game for Windows, Mac OSX or Linux, as well as well as your NAME IN THE GAME\u2019S CREDITS, and exclusive access to our BACKER FORUMS. In addition, this reward tier will give you BETA ACCESS to the game during development.

DIGITAL BASE EDITION\u2014You will received a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD copy of the game for Windows, Mac OSX or Linux, as well as well as your NAME IN THE GAME\u2019S CREDITS, and exclusive access to our BACKER FORUMS. An exclusive IN-GAME ITEM will also be yours right from the start, as well as a selection of exclusive WALLPAPERS. In addition, this reward tier will give you BETA ACCESS to the game during development.
BARD EDITION\u2014This one will get you all of the previous tier rewards, as well as a DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK copy of the game\u2019s music.
DOUBLE THE FUN EDITION\u2014This reward tier essentially gives you TWO DIGITAL BASE EDITIONS, for you to share with a friend or family member.

PAINTERLY EDITION\u2014This tier will give you a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD copy of the game, as well as well as your NAME IN THE GAME\u2019S CREDITS, and exclusive access to our BACKER FORUMS. An exclusive IN-GAME ITEM will also be yours right from the start, as well as a selection of exclusive WALLPAPERS and the DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK. As an added bonus, you will receive a DIGITAL ART BOOK with illustrations from the game as a PDF file or an actual EPUB and MOBI eBook. Most importantly however, from this reward tier onward you will have ALPHA ACCESS to the game during development.

INSTANT WINNER EDITION\u2014If you\u2019re quick, here you have the chance to get a complete REAL DEAL EDITION, containing all digital goodies, as well as a physical copy of the game, all at a reduced price over the regular edition. But be quick, this tier is strictly limited and when they\u2019re gone, they\u2019re gone!
TOME EDITION\u2014In addition to the PAINTERLY EDITION, this one will also give you an EBOOK COPY OF THE DEATHFIRE NOVEL by award-winning fantasy author Steven Savile.
THE REAL DEAL EDITION\u2014This reward tier will give you the TOME EDITION with all of its the digital goodies, along with a PHYSICAL COPY OF THE GAME as it is sold in stores.

DIGITAL STRATEGIST\u2014Previous tier reward, plus a DIGITAL STRATEGY GUIDE as a PDF file or an actual EPUB and MOBI eBook.\u2028 This is the perfect package for international backers, as it involves no shipping costs or taxes.
STRATEGIST EDITION\u2014Previous tier reward, plus a print edition of the STRATEGY GUIDE.
MOUSER EDITION\u2014In addition to all the cool stuff from the previous tier reward, this pledge level will also contain a MOUSEPAD with an exclusive motive available for Kickstarter backers only.
FAMILY FUN EDITION\u2014 This reward tier gives you TWO THE REAL DEAL EDITIONS, for you to share with a friend or family member.
CLASSIC BARD EDITION\u2014This pledge reward contains everything from the MOUSER EDITION, plus a SOUNDTRACK AUDIO CD.
DRESSED UP EDITION\u2014Previous tier reward plus an EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT with a motive available to Kickstarter backers only.
LIBRARIAN EDITION\u2014Previous tier reward, plus a PRINT COPY OF THE DEATHFIRE NOVEL by Steven Savile.

COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION\u2014 Previous tier reward, but instead of a production-run copy of the game, this will give you a LIMITED EDITION BOXED COPY, available only to Kickstarter backers. This boxed copy features a unique cover artwork and will include the game\u2019s DVD, soundtrack CD, a printed manual, strategy guide, a map, and additional materials.
SUPERFAN EDITION\u2014This is the same as the COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION, but it will give you a SIGNED LIMITED EDITION BOXED COPY.

GRIMOIRE EDITION\u2014Previous tier reward, plus this pledge level will also get you a UNIQUE LEATHERBOUND GRIMOIRE-STYLE NOTEBOOK. Wherever you go, this notebook will get you noticed, though it also makes for a great display item.
ART LOVER EDITION\u2014Previous tier reward, plus a FULL-COLOR PRINT EDITION ART BOOK. This coffee table art book will be filled with illustrations, sketches and images from the game.
DOUBLE WHAMMY EDITION\u2014This tier will give you TWO COMPLETE COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION TIER REWARDS. One for yourself and one for a friend or family member.
ART COLLECTOR EDITION\u2014In this tier you will receive the complete ART LOVER EDITION, along with a SIGNED SENIGRAPH of the game\u2019s cover.
NETHERMANCER EDITION\u2014Previous tier reward, plus the ability to play a NETHERMANCER CLASS IN THE GAME! This class is available only to Kickstarter backers at this level and higher!

WRITER\u2019S EDITION\u2014This will give you the HARDCORE FAN EDITION. In addition, we will give you the chance to WRITE YOUR OWN SHORT STORY that will then be found in the game in the form of a book, for every player of the game to read. If you\u2019re an aspiring writer, here\u2019s your chance to shine and get your story in front of people.

KAHUNA EDITION\u2014 This reward tier has been optimized to give you the most bang for your buck, by removing various costly physical items!  You will receive a LIMITED EDITION BOXED COPY, signed by the team and available only to Kickstarter backers, which features a unique cover artwork and includes the game\u2019s DVD, soundtrack CD, a printed manual, strategy guide, a cloth map, and additional materials.\r\nIn addition, it will give you the opportunity to DESIGN YOUR OWN MONSTER for the game. We will provide you with instructions, you run wild with your ideas, and we will put them in the game, including the creation of a 3D model of your monster for every player to combat.\r\nNote: This reward tier is unique and does NOT propagate upwards!
HARDCORE FAN\u2014Previous tier reward, plus an exclusive, handcrafted 8-inch tall COLLECTABLE RESIN FIGURINE/BUST that will not be sold anywhere else.

MONSTER EDITION\u2014This will give you the HARDCORE EDITION and also give you the chance to DESIGN YOUR OWN MONSTER for the game. We will provide you with instructions, you run wild with your ideas, and we will put them in the game, including the creation of a 3D model for everyone to combat.

CHARACTER EDITION\u2014This will give you the HARDCORE EDITION and also give you the chance to DESIGN YOUR OWN NON-PLAYER CHARACTER for the game. We will provide you with instructions, you run wild with your ideas, and we will put them in the game.
BE IN THE GAME EDITION\u2014In addition to giving you a HARDCORE EDITION, we will put YOUR FACE IN THE GAME.

NAMELESS ONE EDITION\u2014This is a singular opportunity to get YOUR FACE ON THE COVER! This could be the beginning of your modeling career. In fact, over ten years after posing for the cover of \u201cPlanescape: Torment\u201d people still keep asking Guido about the cover. Naturally, we will also give you a HARDCORE EDITION of the game.

ULTIMATE FAN EDITION\u2014You are our absolute hero and you deserve EVERYTHING! You will get TOP BILLING IN THE GAME CREDITS, along with a LIFETIME SUBSCRIPTION TO ALL DEATHFIRE SEQUELS. In addition we will give you FIVE COPIES OF EVERYTHING - five games, five novels, five soundtrack CDs, five resin figurines\u2026 you get the idea. In addition, we will send you a PERSONAL NOTE that will be signed by all team members.
